title: Wedgwood
creator_credit: World Wide, Clifford Parris and Ray Townsend
brief_description: An insight into the world of Wedgwood - one of the most celebrated pottery manufacturers in the world. Bernard Price talks about the extraordinary man Joshua I, who founded the company in 1759, and then discusses Wedgwood designs, both antique and modern, with a number of people both inside and outside the Wedgwood organisation.
